jobDescription: This position is ideal for systems administrators who are looking to improve their security skills and work in a positive, flexible work environment. In general, Xantrion IT senior support administrators are responsible for resolving Information Technology (IT) issues and helping clients adhere to the Xantrion Security Policy. Work includes, but is not limited to: identifying, researching, and solving Windows server, Active Directory, security, Exchange email, Office 365 and networking problems. The position requires accurate documentation and problem monitoring to ensure timely problem resolution. Work is performed remotely and at client locations. Required IT Senior Support Administrator Experience and Qualifications 10 - 15 years of relevant experience is required.
